name: ricocheted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
ricochet
If a ball or bullet ricochets, it hits a surface and moves away from it at an angle: The ball ricocheted off the goalkeeper and into the net. Synonyms
bounce
rebound
